articles.author: Bill Bredesen, Bridget Brown, Vanessa Gera, Curtis Yee, Michael Warren
articles.title: Trump visits Japan as a US-China trade deal draws closer - AP News
articles.description: In Asia for the first time this term, Donald Trump is expected to work on investment deals and peace efforts before meeting face-to-face with Chinese President Xi Jinping to try to deescalate a trade war.
articles.content:
Senate Majority Leader John Thune says he spoke with the president late Sunday but offered no new strategy for ending the government shutdown, now in its 27th day.
He, like all of us, wants the gove… [+475 chars]
